settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteAppDataDescription: This will erase every profile, key, and local files. This can't be undone.
settings.signOutWarning: Are you sure? If you haven't saved your private key, you won't be able to log back in.
settings.accountSignedOutSwitched: Account signed out. Switched to the other available account.
settings.failedToCheckAccountsAfterLogout: Failed to check accounts after logout
settings.deleteAllKeyPackagesFromRelays: Delete all key packages from relays
settings.deleteAllKeyPackagesDescription: This will delete all key packages for the active account. Other users won't be able to invite you to new encrypted conversations until you generate new key packages. This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteKeyPackageDescription: This will delete key package #{number}. Other users won't be able to use this key package to invite you to new encrypted conversations. This action cannot be undone.

profile.unsavedChangesQuestion: Do you want to save your changes before leaving?

nostrKeys.publicKeyDescription: Your public key is your unique identifier in the Nostr network, enabling others to verify and recognize your messages. Share it openly!
nostrKeys.privateKeyDescription: Private key works like a secret password that grants access to your Nostr identity.
nostrKeys.privateKeyWarningDescription: Don't share your private key publicly, and use it only to log in to other Nostr apps.

network.myRelaysHelp: Relays you have defined for use across all your Nostr applications.
network.inboxRelaysHelp: Relays used to receive invitations and start secure conversations with new users.
network.keyPackageRelaysHelp: Relays that store your secure key so others can invite you to encrypted conversations.
network.pleaseEnterValidRelay: Please enter a valid relay URL
network.removeRelayConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this relay? This action cannot be undone.

wallet.connectionDescription: Connect your bitcoin lightning wallet to send and receive payments in White Noise.
wallet.informationAnswer: You can connect any wallet that supports Nostr Wallet Connect. See a full list

donate.description: As a not-for-profit, White Noise exists solely for your privacy and freedom, not for profit. Your support keeps us independent and uncompromised.

chats.startNewChat: Click the "+" button to start a new chat
chats.followsLoadingError: Sorry, we couldn't load follows because of an error.
chats.appWontWorkUntilRelay: The app won't work until you add at least one.
chats.profileReadyDescription: Tap Search For Friends to search for users now, or use the + chat icon in the top-right corner whenever you like.
chats.userNotOnWhiteNoise: {userName} isn't on White Noise yet. Share the download link to start a secure chat.
chats.secureInvitationSent: Sent you a secure chat invitation.
chats.removeFromGroupConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the group? They'll lose access to all messages and group activity. You'll need to invite them again if you want them back.
chats.noUserToStartChatWith: No user to start chat with

auth.scanYourPrivateKeyQr: Scan your Private Key QR code.
auth.privacySecuritySubtitle: Keep your conversations private. Even in case of a breach, your messages remain secure.
auth.chooseIdentitySubtitle: Chat without revealing your phone number or email. Choose your identity: real name, pseudonym, or anonymous.
auth.decentralizedPermissionlessSubtitle: No central authority controls your communication—no permissions needed, no censorship possible.

notifications.tapToReturnToApp: Tap to return to the app

ui.usersNotReadyForSecureMessaging: These users aren't ready for secure messaging yet. Share White Noise with them to get started!
ui.failedToCreateDirectMessageGroup: Failed to create direct message group
ui.noUserToAddToGroup: No user to add to group
ui.deleteAllKeyPackagesFromRelays: Delete all key packages from relays
ui.invitedToSecureChat: {name} invited you to a secure chat.
ui.invitedYouToSecureChat: invited you to a secure chat
ui.noGroupsCreateDescription: You are not a member of any groups. Make a new group to add someone.
ui.failedToCreateGroup: Failed to create group chat. Please try again.
ui.inviteMessage: Join me on White Noise. No phone number. No surveillance. Just real privacy. Download it here: https://www.whitenoise.chat/download

errors.errorOccurredTryAgain: An error occurred, please try again.
errors.invalidPublicKeySummary: One or more public keys are invalid. Please double-check all participant and admin keys, then try again.
errors.relayUrlSummary: There is a problem with a relay URL in your setup. Check your relay URLs in Settings and try again.
errors.nostrParseSummary: We could not parse some Nostr data required for this action. Please verify your relays and data, then try again.
errors.nostrHexSummary: One of the hex values (likely a public key) is malformed. Please double-check the value and try again.
errors.keyPackageHelp: Ask affected members to open WhiteNoise so their encryption keys refresh.
errors.invalidPubkeyHelp: Group creation failed because one of the public keys is invalid. Please double-check all member and admin keys, then try again.
errors.accountLookupHelp: We could not find an account for your active key. Please log out and back in or create a new identity, then try again.
errors.relayConfigurationHelp: Your account does not have any valid Nostr relays configured (NIP-65). Please add at least one relay in Settings and try again.
errors.networkHelp: This appears to be a network connectivity issue. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.permissionHelp: This appears to be a permission issue. You may not have permission to perform this operation.
errors.relayConnectivityHelp: Unable to connect to Nostr relays. Please check your network connection.
errors.databaseHelp: There was an issue with local data storage. Please restart the app.
errors.genericHelp: Check your data, connection, and permissions, then try again.
errors.groupCreationFallback: Group creation failed; verify member keys, network, permissions, and try again.
errors.messageSendFallback: Message failed to send; check your connection and try again.
